books.title: Number Systems: From Natural Numbers to Reals
books.author: Claude Code
books.description: A rigorous construction of the fundamental number systems from first principles. Starting with Peano axioms for natural numbers, this book systematically builds integers, rationals, and reals through mathematical constructions.

books.title: Representation Theory
books.author: James and Liebeck
books.description: A demonstration of the Tarskido system showcasing representation theory concepts including Maschke's theorem and related results.

books.title: Elliptic Functions: A Modern Approach
books.author: George Dickeson
books.description: A systematic development of elliptic functions from lattices through Liouville's fundamental theorems to the Weierstrass â„˜-function. Based on AMSI course materials, emphasizing the logical structure and dependencies between key results.

metadata.description: Demo books available for immediate exploration in Tarskido
